mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(paragraph):
    cleaned_paragraph = re.sub('', '', paragraph.lower())
    words = cleaned_paragraph.split()
    common_words = ['the', 'a', 'an', 'and', 'in', 'on', 'at', 'to', 'of', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were', 'not', 'so', 'after', 'all']
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if word not in common_words]
    word_counts = Counter(filtered_words)
    return dict(word_counts)

import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(paragraph):
    cleaned_paragraph = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', paragraph.lower())
    words = cleaned_paragraph.split()
    common_words = ['the', 'a', 'an', 'and', 'in', 'on', 'at', 'to', 'of', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were', 'not', 'so', 'after', 'all']
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if word not in common_words]
    word_counts = Counter(filtered_words)
    return dict(word_counts)

mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(paragraph):
    cleaned_paragraph = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', paragraph.lower())
    words = cleaned_paragraph.split()
    common_words = ['the', 'a', 'an', 'and', 'in', 'on', 'at', 'to', 'of', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were', 'not', 'so', 'after', 'all']
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if word in common_words]
    word_counts = Counter(filtered_words)
    return dict(word_counts)
